ul.li: How many ways are there of picking one digit (from 0-9), followed by one letter (A-Z)?
Suppose automobile license plates in an imaginary country consist of $a numbers,followed by $b letters, followed by $c numbers.

text.p: How many different standard plates are possible in this system? (Assume repetition of letters and numbers is allowed.)
